mapper.select: SELECT A.BORD_TYPE AS bordType , A.BORD_NO AS bordNo , A.DEL_YN AS delYn , A.BORD_TITLE AS bordTitle , A.BORD_SUB_TITLE AS bordSubTitle , A.BORD_CONTENT AS bordContent , A.BORD_RD_CNT AS bordRdCnt , A.BORD_GD_CNT AS bordGdCnt , (SELECT COUNT(S.CMMT_NO) FROM wit_bord110t S WHERE S.BORD_TYPE = A.BORD_TYPE AND S.BORD_NO = A.BORD_NO) AS commentCnt , DATE_FORMAT(A.CRE_DATE, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS creDateTxt , (SELECT S.NICK_NAME FROM prsn000t S WHERE S.CLERK_NO = A.CRE_USER) AS creUser , A.CRE_DATE AS creDate , A.UPD_USER AS updUser , A.UPD_DATE AS updDate , (SELECT CONCAT(S.FILE_LOC, S.FILE_ID) FROM wit_file000t S WHERE S.BIZ_CD = 'B001' AND S.BIZ_KEY = A.BORD_NO LIMIT 1) AS imagePath FROM wit_bord100t A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.BORD_TYPE = #{bordType} AND A.BORD_NO = #{bordNo} ORDER BY A.BORD_NO DESC
SELECT CONCAT(S.FILE_LOC, S.FILE_ID) AS imagePath FROM wit_file000t S WHERE S.BIZ_CD = 'B001' AND S.BIZ_KEY = #{bordNo}
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CAST(BORD_NO AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1 FROM wit_bord100t WHERE BORD_TYPE = #{bordType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wit_bord100t ( BORD_TYPE, BORD_NO, DEL_YN, BORD_TITLE, BORD_SUB_TITLE, BORD_CONTENT, BORD_RD_CNT, CRE_USER, CRE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{bordType}, #{bordNo}, 'N', #{bordTitle}, #{bordSubTitle}, #{bordContent}, 0, #{creUser}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.CMMT_NO AS cmmtNo , A.CMMT_SEQ AS cmmtSeq , A.BORD_TYPE AS bordType , A.BORD_NO AS bordNo , A.DEL_YN AS delYn , A.CMMT_CONTENT AS cmmtContent , A.CRE_USER AS creUser , A.CRE_DATE AS creDate , DATE_FORMAT(A.CRE_DATE, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS creDateTxt FROM wit_bord110t A WHERE A.BORD_TYPE = #{bordType} AND A.BORD_NO = #{bordNo} ORDER BY A.CMMT_SEQ
